item.title: RT by @AlunaLondon: The editor-in-chief of a secret magazine that was published there was 16yo Petr Ginz. Before he was transported to Auschwitz and killed, he drew a picture of Earth as seen from the Moon. In 2018 a copy of the picture was brougt to space by an American astronaut in Petr's memory.
item.dc:creator: @_Adela_Ch
item.description: The editor-in-chief of a secret magazine that was published there was 16yo Petr Ginz. Before he was transported to Auschwitz and killed, he drew a picture of Earth as seen from the Moon. In 2018 a copy of the picture was brougt to space by an American astronaut in Petr's memory.

item.title: RT by @AlunaLondon: Explore the beauty of Aurorae with us in our Northern Lights over London event as we are joined by the artist behind the upcoming #GDIF #Borealis display to discuss aurorae, from art to photography and even aurorae on other planets in our solar system! https://www.rmg.co.uk/whats-on/royal-observatory/northern-lights-over-london
item.dc:creator: @ROGAstronomers
item.description:
Explore the beauty of Aurorae with us in our Northern Lights over London event as we are joined by the artist behind the upcoming #GDIF #Borealis display to discuss aurorae, from art to photography and even aurorae on other planets in our solar system!
